to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Author implemented the piece-rate system based on J2EE platform.
sentences.chinese: 實現了基於J2EE平臺的計件工資系統。

sentences.english: G. C. Henning: As an employer of labor, I found that the piece-rate system does not work.
sentences.chinese: 作爲工人的僱主，我發現計件工資率體系無法運行。

sentences.english: Unemployment has pushed down the piece rates that factories pay for each garment sewn or toy assembled.
sentences.chinese: 失業使得工廠裏縫製大衣或組合玩具的計件工資下降。

sentences.english: Designs for piece workers payment structure and participates in workflow analysis.
sentences.chinese: 設計計件工資方案並參與工作流程分析。

sentences.english: Incentive piecework system is suited for production workers.
sentences.chinese: 激勵計件工資制適用於生產工人。

sentences.english: Determination of the piece-rate wage standard.
Regarding those who exercise the piece wage, their wage shall be based on the principle of "more pay for more work".
sentences.chinese: 執行定額計件工資制的，按多勞多得原則計算工資。
